title: Technology Agnostic
description:
Connect any technology. As long as the technology you want to connect can send and/or receive data it means that it is possible to connect to MESG.
It can be any traditional web service, any blockchain technologies, IoT or any private event system that your company might have...

You get it, anything with data can be connected to MESG.

title: Service Oriented
description:
Organize, use and re-use parts of your application into services. Every service will be its own application with its own tasks and events that your application will be able to connect to.

This kind of architecture is really interesting because it helps you create flexible applications and easily maintainable.

title: Event Driven
description:
Imperative programming is so old-school now we want real time and event driven applications are really reactive.
Now the only business logic that you have to write is just to describe when you want to execute a specific task.

Your application is just a simple list of when ... then ...

title: Almost no coding
description:
With an event driven and service oriented application, now building features on your application is really simple and you don't even need any coding skills to create an application.

You want a specific workflow, then just describe it in a workflow file and your application is all set and ready to run.

title: Decentralized
description:
Decentralization is really more than just a hot topic, it's the new way to create applications where you don't need servers anymore and make sure they are up 100% of the time.

With MESG, services of your application runs everywhere and every part of your application is executed by different actors of the newtork.
